name: com.android.settings.SettingsInitialize
description: Listens to Intent.ACTION_PRE_BOOT_COMPLETED and Intent.ACTION_USER_INITIALIZED performs setup steps for a managed profile (disables the launcher icon of the Settings app, adds cross-profile intent filters for the appropriate Settings activities), disables the webview setting for non-admin users, updates the intent flags for any existing shortcuts and enables DeepLinkHomepageActivity for large screen devices.
